# GCInputRightTrigger

**Global Variable**

The name of the right trigger.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputRightTrigger: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **rightTrigger**: The controller’s right trigger element.

## Trigger names

- **GCInputLeftTrigger**: The name of the left trigger.
